|Family = {[[Arthur Dayne]]} - son|Culture = [[Dornishmen]]}}'''Beric DayneÂ '''â€‹is an unseen character in ''[[Game of Thrones (TV series)|Game of Thrones]]''. He is not expected to appear in the series, being dead by the time it starts. He was the [[Lord of Starfall]].
sections.In the books: In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, Ser Arthur Dayne's father is never named or mentioned. Ser Arthur's nephew Edric Dayne is the [[Lord of Starfall]] during the events of the series.
sections.Biography:
